title: Half-Elf
content:
l Speed: Move up to 9m per turn. Civil Militia: Proficiency with Spears, Pikes, Halberds, and Glaives, Light Armour and Shield. Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12 m.

BG3 Half-Elf Subraces

High Half-Elf Know one Cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability. Wood Half-Elf Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10.5m per turn. Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in
